F1_Q_INCONVENIENCE.title: Inconvenience to operator?
F1_Q_INCONVENIENCE.body: The deficiency was an inconvenience to the operator and the SUT could be changed or modified in a manner that would improve operations for the operator?

F1_A_RECOMMENDATION.title: Classification: Recommendation
F1_A_RECOMMENDATION.body:
Treat as recommendation.

Recommendations can be written to the program office to improve SUT use in the fleet, or written to the fleet to identify work arounds for SUT operations.

F1_Q_SUPPORT_SYSTEM.title: Support system deficiency?
F1_Q_SUPPORT_SYSTEM.body: The deficiency was on a support system (i.e. tech-manual tools, parts, materials, supply system, etc.)?

F1_Q_ADDITIONAL_WORK.title: Additional operator work?
F1_Q_ADDITIONAL_WORK.body: Did the deficiency induce additional work or cause the operator to perform tasks that add additional man-hours or steps that were not previously identified in the development phase?

F1_A_OPCON.title: Classification: Operational Consideration (OPCON)
F1_A_OPCON.body:
Treat as an operational consideration (OPCON).

The OPCON should identify how the deficiency affects the operation of the system, and how the operator can mitigate the effects the deficiency has on meeting mission requirements.

F1_Q_COMMANDER_MANEUVER.title: Commander maneuver required?
F1_Q_COMMANDER_MANEUVER.body: Did the deficiency require the commander to maneuver, or operate their unit or force in a specific manner to ensure mission success?

F1_A_TACON.title: Classification: Tactical Consideration (TACON)
F1_A_TACON.body:
Treat as a Tactical Consideration (TACON).

The TACON should identify how the deficiency affects the operational mission, and the tactical considerations for the commander which can mitigate the effects the deficiency has on meeting mission requirements.

F1_Q_DIRECT_REQ_SUPPORT.title: Direct requirement (support references)?
F1_Q_DIRECT_REQ_SUPPORT.body: Is the deficiency directly related to a requirement that is listed in the CPD, CDD, Life Cycle Sustainment Plan, or system publication, PMS, or other SUT reference Document?

F1_Q_DIRECT_REQ_OR_TACTIC.title: Direct requirement or tactic?
F1_Q_DIRECT_REQ_OR_TACTIC.body: Is the deficiency directly related to a requirement that is listed in the CPD, CDD or a tactic listed in a TTP or CONOP?

F1_Q_DERIVED_REQ_CONCUR_A.title: Derived requirement concurred (Path A)?
F1_Q_DERIVED_REQ_CONCUR_A.body: Is the deficiency related to a derived requirement that has been concurred with by the resource sponsor?

F1_Q_DATA_OP_QUANT.title: Data can be analyzed quantitatively?
F1_Q_DATA_OP_QUANT.body: Can the data collected concerning the deficiency and the operation of the system be characterized and analyzed quantitatively?

F1_A_DATA_OP_QUAL.title: Qualitative characterization
F1_A_DATA_OP_QUAL.body: The data collected concerning the deficiency and the operation of the system will be characterized and analyzed qualitatively.

F1_A_DETERMINE_OMF_HANDOFF.title: Handoff: Determine if OMF
F1_A_DETERMINE_OMF_HANDOFF.body:
Determine if the deficiency is an Operational Mission Failure (OMF).

Refer to Figure 2 (Sheets 1â€“3) for OMF determination.

F1_Q_DERIVED_REQ_CONCUR_D.title: Derived requirement concurred (Path D)?
F1_Q_DERIVED_REQ_CONCUR_D.body: Is the deficiency related to a derived requirement that has been concurred with by the resource sponsor?

F1_A_REQUEST_CONCURRENCE_BLUE.title: Request concurrence / Generate Blue Sheet
F1_A_REQUEST_CONCURRENCE_BLUE.body:
Request concurrence from the resource sponsor on the derived requirement.

Generate a Blue sheet for the identified deficiency.
(Refer to Figure 2 sheet 1 for OMF determination.)
On the Blue sheet state 'awaiting resource sponsor concurrence'.

Generate Results paragraph that describes the deficiency.

F1_Q_DATA_EFFECT_QUANT.title: Data (deficiency effect) quantitative?
F1_Q_DATA_EFFECT_QUANT.body: Can the data collected concerning the deficiency and how the deficiency affected the operation of the system be characterized and analyzed quantitatively?

F1_A_DATA_EFFECT_QUAL.title: Qualitative characterization (deficiency effect)
F1_A_DATA_EFFECT_QUAL.body: The data collected concerning the deficiency and how the deficiency affected the operation of the system will be characterized and analyzed qualitatively.

F1_A_REFER_FIG4_SHEET3.title: Next step: Quantitative baseline
F1_A_REFER_FIG4_SHEET3.body: Refer to the Quantitative baseline flow diagram (Figure 4 sheet 3 of 4) to assist with determining the Operational Impact and Mission Criticality of the Deficiency.

F1_A_REFER_FIG3_SHEET3.title: Next step: Qualitative baseline
F1_A_REFER_FIG3_SHEET3.body: Refer to the Qualitative baseline flow diagram (Figure 3 sheet 3 of 4) to assist with determining the Operational Impact and Mission Criticality of the Deficiency.
